For anybody in a similar situation, these worked for us.

Recommended shim by Vex in another thread:
If you notice your Falcon doesn’t have a shaft shim, there are two options:

You can contact VEX (link above) and we can send you shaft shims free of charge.
You can buy a box of 25 shims from McMaster-Carr. The part number is 94773A712.

Note the recommended shim is .020" not 1/16"

Thread link
